mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Sarah Tracy to Mary Morris Hamilton, 1860 April 19
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tracy, Sarah, 1820-1896
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Sarah Tracy, secretary, on behalf of Ann Pamela Cunningham to Mary Morris Hamilton, Vice Regent from New York, April 19, 1860. Says Miss Cunningham enjoyed her visit with Miss Hamilton's sister and wishes she could have attended the event on Saturday which she heard was a great success. Asks for Miss Hamilton to send money so they can buy supplies at wholesale for repairs. Includes typed partial transcription of the letter.
